    <p class="attributed-text-segment-list__content text-color-text !text-sm whitespace-pre-wrap break-words
        attributed-text-segment-list__content-truncated" dir="ltr" data-test-id="main-feed-activity-card__commentary">We were delighted to host this year’s <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fb2believe&amp;trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>#B2Believe</a> in New York City, where hundreds of B2B marketers gathered to rethink, reimagine and redefine the future of B2B marketing. ✨ 
 
💡There were so many outstanding takeaways: From keynotes on tapping into creativity in order to build collective confidence among buying groups, to the importance of advocating for inclusive storytelling.
 
➡️ ICYMI: We announced two new product offerings: Connected TV (CTV) and LinkedIn Premiere, in partnership with <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/nbcuniversal-inc-?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>NBCUniversal</a>, two cutting-edge solutions to help B2B brands reach new customers. Learn more: <a class="link" href="https://lnkd.in/gApcphSR?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" rel="nofollow" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>https://lnkd.in/gApcphSR</a>
 
Were you there in-person? What were your favorite moments? Sound off in the comments! 💬</p>

        " dir="ltr" data-test-id="main-feed-activity-card__commentary">Keen to build on the success <a class="link" href="https://dk.linkedin.com/company/dreamdata-io?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>Dreamdata</a> customers had experienced with Offline Conversions, they recently participated in the CAPI beta to bring the new functionality to customers as it first became available.

        <ul class="collapsible-dropdown__list hidden container-raised absolute w-auto overflow-y-auto flex-col items-stretch z-1 bottom-auto top-[100%]" role="menu" tabindex="-1">
          
              

                <li class="ellipsis-menu__item border-t-1 border-solid border-color-border-low-emphasis first-of-type:border-none flex">
                  

    
    

    

    

    <a href="/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Flinkedin-ads_this-week-in-marketing-b2believe-in-a-bright-activity-7184626335384760320-NqSJ&amp;trk=public_post_main-feed-card_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&amp;guestReportContentType=POST&amp;_f=guest-reporting" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect" data-tracking-will-navigate data-item-type="semaphore" data-semaphore-content-type="POST" data-semaphore-content-urn="urn:li:activity:7184626335384760320" data-semaphore-tracking-prefix="public_post_main-feed-card_ellipsis-menu-semaphore" data-is-logged-in="false" data-modal="semaphore__toggle" class="semaphore__toggle visited:text-color-text-secondary ellipsis-menu__semaphore ellipsis-menu__item-button flex items-center w-full p-1 cursor-pointer font-sans text-sm font-bold link-styled focus:link-styled link:no-underline active:bg-color-background-container-tint focus:bg-color-background-container-tint hover:bg-color-background-container-tint outline-offset-[-2px]">

  <div class="attributed-text-segment-list__container relative mt-1 mb-1.5 babybear:mt-0 babybear:mb-0.5">
    <p class="attributed-text-segment-list__content text-color-text !text-sm whitespace-pre-wrap break-words
        " dir="ltr" data-test-id="main-feed-activity-card__commentary">This year's B2Believe brought together some of the sharpest minds in B2B marketing to talk about what’s new, what’s coming soon and how B2B marketers can be more effective.

The big takeaway: Technology is helping usher in a bright future for B2B marketers. We have more data on-hand than ever before, and new tools to help us make sense of that data.

💡 ICYMI: The latest edition of This Week in Marketing discusses the bright B2B future: <a class="link" href="https://lnkd.in/gF8KVU7q?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" rel="nofollow" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>https://lnkd.in/gF8KVU7q</a></p>

  <div class="attributed-text-segment-list__container relative mt-1 mb-1.5 babybear:mt-0 babybear:mb-0.5">
    <p class="attributed-text-segment-list__content text-color-text !text-sm whitespace-pre-wrap break-words
        " dir="ltr" data-test-id="main-feed-activity-card__commentary">Nearly 1 in 2 B2B CMOs and CFOs say the CMO role has evolved to have a more direct role in driving revenue and growth, and that CMOs are expected to demonstrate marketing impact to the bottom line.
 
That's where we come in: at LinkedIn, we're building measurement tools, including Conversions API (CAPI), Revenue Attribution Report and Website Actions, that help B2B marketers capture impact and demonstrate business outcomes from their campaigns. 
 
Ready to learn more? Dive into a discussion with our measurement experts, <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/johannakimura?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>Johanna Kimura</a> and <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/hellojaesoh?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>Jae O.</a>, on the <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/speedwork?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>Speedwork -- LinkedIn Ads Agency</a> podcast. Thanks to <a class="link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/anthonyblatner?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>Anthony Blatner</a> for steering such an insightful conversation!

🎧 <a class="link" href="https://lnkd.in/g9qSkshQ?trk=public_post_main-feed-card-text" target="_self" rel="nofollow" data-tracking-control-name="public_post_main-feed-card-text" data-tracking-will-navigate>https://lnkd.in/g9qSkshQ</a></p>

        " dir="ltr" data-test-id="main-feed-activity-card__commentary">Marketing is a world that continues to evolve at such a fast pace! As new marketing solutions become available, the role of LinkedIn Marketing Partners has become increasingly vital to B2B marketers.

The LinkedIn Marketing Partner Awards not only honor the outstanding work of our partners and the value they provide through their LinkedIn solutions, but it also spotlights the transformative power of collaboration and innovation in achieving successful customer outcomes.
